django.template.backends.base
=============================

.. py:module:: django.template.backends.base


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.template.backends.base.BaseEngine


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: BaseEngine(params)

   .. py:attribute:: name


   .. py:attribute:: dirs


   .. py:attribute:: app_dirs


   .. py:property:: app_dirname


   .. py:method:: from_string(template_code)
      :abstractmethod:


      Create and return a template for the given source code.

      This method is optional.



   .. py:method:: get_template(template_name)
      :abstractmethod:


      Load and return a template for the given name.

      Raise TemplateDoesNotExist if no such template exists.



   .. py:method:: template_dirs()

      Return a list of directories to search for templates.



   .. py:method:: iter_template_filenames(template_name)

      Iterate over candidate files for template_name.

      Ignore files that don't lie inside configured template dirs to avoid
      directory traversal attacks.
